Name: Chiclet Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
2.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve in a chilled glass.
Review: A wonderfully refreshing drink on a summer's day with surprisingly subtle flavours.
History: Often found on Cuban bar menus, this was created at La Floridita, Havana.
Nutrition: One serving of Chiclet Daiquiri contains 160 calories
Garnish: Banana chunk or dried banana chip
